Russia says it downs five Ukrainian drones south of MoscowRussia said its air defences intercepted five Ukrainian drones south of Moscow in the space of less than an hour on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:29:17 GMT 6DSSGXMKIRODZALLWF3YHOVAUI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ Russia-says-it-downs- Five-ukrainian-drones-south-moscow-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Ukraine says it downs 24 of 28 Russian drones, debris damages granaryUkraine shot down 24 of 28 Shahed drones launched by Russia in an overnight attack that damaged residential buildings in Kyiv and an infrastructure facility and grain warehouse in southern regions, officials said. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 12:15:15 GMT TIXLT5Q3LFOARALILR6WWD64RI https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/ukraine-says-it-downs-24-28- Russian-drones-debris-damages-granary-2023-12-22/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia: Diplomatic ties with US could break down over asset seizuresRussia may cut diplomatic ties with the United States if Washington confiscates Russian assets frozen over the Ukrainian war, the Interfax news agency quoted Deputy Foreign Minister Sergei Ryabkov as saying on Friday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 11:44:03 GMT RE4ID5PKCJNRJMGJ4653R7FDXI https://www.reuters.com/world/ Russia-diplomatic-ties-with-us-could-break-down-over-asset-seizures-2023-12-22/Reuters世界
At least 31 killed in floods in India's Tamil NaduAt least 31 people were killed in floods and heavy rain in India's southern state of Tamil Nadu this week, a top federal minister said on Friday, as rescuers struggled to reach scores still stranded in high waters. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 11:41:50 GMT N5TQ4NHYCRIXTBNFVHL6Q46T7U https://www.reuters.com/world/india/least-31-killed-floods-indias-tamil-nadu-2023-12-22/Praveen Paramasivam世界印度
US takes aim at financial institutions with new Russia sanctions authorityU.S. President Joe Biden on Friday will sign an executive order allowing Washington to impose sanctions on financial institutions that help Russia evade sanctions, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen said. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 11:05:21 GMT U4GBK4D5L5J5DMQLPSYKVPNCRM https://www.reuters.com/world/us/us-takes-aim-financial-institutions-with-new-Russia-sanctions-authority-2023-12-22/Daphne Psaledakis, Andrea Shalal世界美国
France's Macron to visit New Delhi on Jan 26 for India's Republic Day — ElyseeFrench President Emmanuel Macron will visit India's capital New Delhi on January 26 for India's Republic Day, the Elysee French presidential palace said on Friday, adding Macron would be welcomed as "chief guest". How Congo's election could unfold and why it mattersDemocratic Republic of Congo held presidential and legislative elections this week against a backdrop of militia violence in the east, a chaotic campaign and claims the electoral commission was not prepared to hold a free and fair vote. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:57:30 GMT I2TBRXQQEVJKRD6CSLHKKWCIIA https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/how-congos-election-could-unfold-why-it-matters-2023-12-22/Reuters世界非洲
Uzbekistan summons Russian envoy over politician's annexation remarkUzbekistan's foreign ministry has summoned the Russian ambassador over a call by a Russian politician to annex the former Soviet republic, it said late on Thursday. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:52:09 GMT JTQ7JZFQDFJG7B3ZQDWDLXB2XY https://www.reuters.com/world/uzbekistan-summons- Russian-envoy-over-politicians-annexation-remark-2023-12-22/Reuters世界
Congo awaits first provisional election results after messy voteDemocratic Republic of Congo voters were waiting on Friday for the first results from presidential and legislative elections after an unscheduled day-long ballot extension that prompted some opposition candidates to cry foul and call for a rerun. Fri, 22 Dec 2023 10:49:34 GMT 24YW5MUKIFJVTPHW5Y673QZATI https://www.reuters.com/world/africa/congo-awaits-first-provisional-election-results-after-messy-vote-2023-12-22/Reuters世界非洲
Russia dismisses Wall Street Journal's 'pulp fiction' after Prigozhin death reportThe Kremlin accused the Wall Street Journal of publishing "pulp fiction" on Friday after it reported that the death of mercenary boss Yevgeny Prigozhin in a plane crash had been orchestrated by Russian security official Nikolai Patrushev. Taiwan, S.China Sea loom as dangers despite revived US-China military dialogueA resumption of military dialogue between China and the United States could help mitigate some tensions, but fundamental differences over Taiwan and the South China Sea still loom as dangerous potential flashpoints, Chinese and Asian analysts say.
